content: small frog doll crochet pattern by spinoceros materials yarn crafter s secret cotton in lime lily sugar n cream in rose lily sugar n cream in black hook size 3 5mm scissors yarn needle stitch marker 6mm safety eyes or black yarn terminology us terms mc - magic_ring chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet increase - increase two single_crochet in one stitch decrease - decrease take front loop of next two stitches single_crochet through those invisible finish - pull the thread through as though you were normally finishing then loop through the next stitch with the needle so it looks like the stitches keep going *repeat inside asterisks* yardage lime - 14 1 yards very small amount of rose and black for embroidery finished size 4 inches from foot to top of head eye bumps in body color make two r1 mc single_crochet 6 6 r2 increase around 12 r3-4 single_crochet around 12 fasten_off invisible finish don t fasten_off on the second one body continuing from the second eye r5 single_crochet 5 in same eye single_crochet 10 in other eye see picture leave two stitches on each eye not including the invisible finish stitch single_crochet 5 in original eye 20 place eyes between round 3-4 on each eye sew gap between eyes closed with any loose thread from the eyes r6-12 single_crochet around 20 sew cheeks between row 5 and 6 sew mouth like in picture r13 decrease 2 single_crochet 6 decrease 2 single_crochet 6 16 slip_stitch invisible finish stuff sew closed horizontally not in a circle legs in body color make two mc single_crochet 6 slip_stitch into first single_crochet to make the circle chain 8 fasten_off and leave a tail for sewing arms in body color make two mc single_crochet 6 slip_stitch into first single_crochet to make the circle chain 6 fasten_off and leave a tail for sewing and you are done please do not sell or distribute this pattern just direct them to the ravelry link you are free to sell whatever you make from this pattern though i would greatly appreciate being credited if you have any problems feel free to email me at spinocerosdesigns@gmail com and i will try to help you as soon as i am able
